item.description:
Please read the entire Write Up and agree to the enclosed Liability Waiver before signing up for this event.

Rating: Moderate

Length: 8 Miles

Time Duration: 4 Hours

Orange: Recommended

The George Parker Woodland Reserve consists of an 860-acre property containing majestic old forest, brooks, fields, and mysterious rock cairns. The caretaker's house was built in the 1700s. The barn has been converted into a nature center. The Parker Reserve contains three trails totaling 8 miles, some of which will be challenging, so please allow 4 hours to complete the hike.

This will be an Adults Only Hike due to the complexity of the terrain and length of the hike.

We will be meeting in the Parking lot (# 1) at the head of the woodland trail at 10:00 AM and hiking into the woodland shortly thereafter. Parking is free and there are no fees to hike the woodlands.

For information on the George Parker Woodlands please visit:

http://www.asri.org/refuges/george-b.-parker-woodland.html

Suggest bringing a good pair of hiking boots, water and light snacks (granola bars, trail mix, etc.).

MeetUp Location: 1670 Maple Valley Road, Coventry, RI.

Directions: Take Rt 95 South to RI 102 North (Exit 5B) . On RI 102 continue North 8.5 miles to Maple Valley Rd. Turn Right onto Maple Valley and 0.1 miles on the left is Parking Area #1 for the Parker Reserve.

Liability Waiver

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the leader(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you for yourself, your heirs, executors, and administrators release, hold harmless, and indemnify the leader(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.

Safety First!

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: Parker Woodland Spring Hike
